item.title: ğŸ‡¬ğŸ‡§ TIL: Avocados and The Rotterdam Effect
item.description: Today I Learned about the 'Rotterdam Effect'. I had an assignment for the lecture of Social Networks. I and my teammate decided to do this research about Avocados and I scraped the United Nations trade data for all the countries. It seems like Netherlands is in the top 3 most profitting countries without even being a major producer for avocados.

item.title: More About Me
item.description: I work across the stack: servers, databases, backend, frontend, and the workflow that connects it all.
